arts.ttl: Wolfsburg reflect on goalless display against lowly Heidenheim: “Our worst game of the season.”
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg trainer Ralph Hasenhüttl didn't mince words after Saturday's home defeat against Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Thomas Keller pens new deal at Heidenheim
arts.sum: Fans at the Voith Arena can look forward to more Thomas Keller performances in the future.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wolfsburg vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Wolfsburg and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
